      • formatDurationToTimeString

        public static java.lang.String formatDurationToTimeString(java.time.Duration duration)
        Returns a human-readable String of a Duration value. Parses hours and minutes and only returns relevant values.
        Parameters:
        duration - Duration object
        Returns:
        String with minutes and, optionally, hours

      • distanceToString

        public static java.lang.String distanceToString(double distance,
                                                boolean isKm)
        Returns a human readable String of a distance. Outputs meters for values under 1000 meters and kilometers for values above.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance
        isKm - if unit is in kilometers (meters if false)
        Returns:
        formatted String
